channel.title: L-P Archaeology on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in L-P Archaeology on open-archaeo

item.title: ARK1
item.description: The ARK v1.1.2 Stable Release. ARK (The Archaeological Recording Kit) is a web-based 'toolkit' for the collection, storage and dissemination of archaeological data. It includes data-editing, data-creation, data-viewing and data-sharing tools, all of which are delivered using a web-based front-end.

item.title: Ark2
item.description: ARK (The Archaeological Recording Kit) 2.0 Development Repository. ARK (The Archaeological Recording Kit) is a web-based 'toolkit' for the collection, storage and dissemination of archaeological data. It includes data-editing, data-creation, data-viewing and data-sharing tools, all of which are delivered using a web-based front-end.

item.title: ArkGrid
item.description: A QGIS plugin for local site grids.

item.title: ArkScan
item.description: A simple gui app to simplify scanning single context plans.

item.title: ArkSpatial
item.description: A QGIS plugin to simplfy digitization of archaeological plans drawn using the Museum of London Single Context Recording methodology.

item.title: harris2graph
item.description: harris2graph is a script to help migrate data from the LST file format used by the BASP Harris, Stratify and ArchEd packages into modern graph file formats.
